com.jacobschneider.engine.physics

Interface PhysicsBody

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RigidBody6DOF

    public interface PhysicsBody

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PhysicsBody.Axis
      An enum representing a possible axis of rotation.

    • Method Detail

      • enactImpulse

        void enactImpulse(Vector3 force,
                  Vector3 relativePos)
        Enacts an instantaneous impulse on this body. Collisions use this method to instantaneously change the momentums of this PhysicsBody.
        Parameters:
        force - Instantaneous force with units Force*Time
        relativePos - Position of the impulse relative to the center of mass of this body

      • addInputs

        void addInputs(Vector3 force,
               Vector3 torque)
        Adds a permanent force and torque to this body
        Parameters:
        force - Force to be added
        torque - Torque to be added

      • thrustInputs

        void thrustInputs(Vector3 force,
                  Vector3 torque,
                  float duration)
        Adds a temporary force and torque to this body for a certain duration.
        Parameters:
        force - force to be exerted
        torque - torque to be exerted
        duration - the amount of time the force/torque is exerted for

      • constrainBody

        void constrainBody(Manifold constraint)
        Constraints the position of this body to a Manifold. The body must initially be on the manifold and the constraint will ensure that the velocity of this body is always tangent to the manifold.
        Parameters:
        constraint - Manifold that acts as a constraint

      • update

        void update(double deltaTime)
        Updates the state of this body by one physics frame.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - Time since last physics frame

      • fixBody

        void fixBody()
        Fixes the body completely in space. Gives the body infinite mass and infinite rotational inertia.

      • fixRotation

        void fixRotation()
        Fixes the rotation of a body in space. Gives the body infinite rotational inertia.

      • fixPosition

        void fixPosition()
        Fixes the position of a body in space. Gives the body infinite mass.

      • fixAxes

        void fixAxes(Set<PhysicsBody.Axis> axes)
        Fixes the rotation of a body in space around a set of axes. If an axis is fixed the body cannot rotate around that axis. These axes are the body coordinate basis. Supplying this method with a set of all 3 axis is identical to calling fixRotation().
        Parameters:
        axes - The set of axis you want to fix rotation around.

      • fixRotationAroundAxis

        void fixRotationAroundAxis(Vector3 axisBody,
                           double scalerInertia)
        Prevents all rotation except around a certain arbitrary axis (body coordinates). The scaler inertia of the axis is set to the scalerInertia parameter.
        Parameters:
        axisBody - an arbitrary direction in body space
        scalerInertia - the scaler inertia value around axisBody

      • isFixed

        boolean isFixed()
        Determines if this body is completely fixed
        Returns:
        Whether the body is completely fixed

      • isRotFixed

        boolean isRotFixed()
        Determines if the body's rotation is fixed
        Returns:
        Whether the body's rotation is fixed

      • isPosFixed

        boolean isPosFixed()
        Determines if the body's position is fixed
        Returns:
        Whether the body's position is fixed

      • isAxisFixed

        boolean isAxisFixed(PhysicsBody.Axis axis)
        Determines whether the rotation around a specific axis is fixed.
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis.
        Returns:
        Whether the rotation is fixed.

      • getInvMass

        double getInvMass()
        Returns one divided by the mass of the object. A body with infinite mass returns a value of zero.
        Returns:
        The multiplicative inverse of the mass.

      • getMass

        double getMass()
        Returns the mass of the object. If the mass of the object is infinite (getInvMass() is zero) then this value is Infinity.
        Returns:
        The mass of the object.

      • getI

        Matrix3 getI()
        The inertia tensor of this body. If this body is locked on any axis than this value if
        Returns:
        3x3 matrix representing the inertia tensor of this body.

      • getInvI

        Matrix3 getInvI()
        Returns the inverse of the moment of inertia tensor. This value is always valid even when some axes of rotation are locked.
        Returns:
        3x3 matrix representing the inverse of the inertia tensor.

      • getX

        Vector3 getX()

      • getQ

        Quaternion getQ()

      • getR

        Matrix3 getR()

      • getP

        Vector3 getP()

      • getEnergy

        double getEnergy()
        Calculates and returns the total kinetic energy of the PhysicsBody. This includes the translational and rotational energy.
        Returns:
        - total kinetic energy

      • getSurfaceVelocity

        Vector3 getSurfaceVelocity(Vector3 rp)
        Get absolute velocity (world coordinates) of a point on the bodies surface.
        Parameters:
        rp - vector from this body to point
        Returns:
        Velocity of the point

      • getVel

        Vector3 getVel()

      • getOmega

        Vector3 getOmega()

      • toBodySpace

        Vector3 toBodySpace(Vector3 pW)
        Transforms a point in world space to a point in this bodies space.
        Parameters:
        pW - A point in world space
        Returns:
        The point transformed into body space coordinates

      • toWorldSpace

        Vector3 toWorldSpace(Vector3 pB)
        Transforms a point in this bodies space to world space
        Parameters:
        pB - A point in body space coordinates.
        Returns:
        The point transformed into world space coordinates

      • toBodySpace

        Segment toBodySpace(Segment s)
        Converts a segment from world space to this bodies space
        Parameters:
        s - A segment in world space coordinates
        Returns:
        The point transformed into body space coordinates

      • toWorldSpace

        Segment toWorldSpace(Segment s)
        Converts a segment from this bodies space to world space
        Parameters:
        s - A segment in body space coordinates
        Returns:
        The segment transformed into world space coordinates.
